attributes.action: All Convicted rioters should lose benefits
attributes.additional_details:
We want ALL Convicted rioters to loose all benefits.


Any persons convicted of criminal acts during the current riots should have ALL financial benefits removed. No tax payer should have to contribute to those who have destroyed property, stolen from their community and shown a total disregard for human life and the country that provides for them,let them suffer just as thousands have and are due to these  dispicable acts.
